title: In Australia only
fullText:
*	One of the following means of isolation shall be provided for the gas appliance:
(a)	A plug to an accessible switched socket-outlet.
or
(b)	A plug to a socket-outlet that may be located in an inaccessible position but has a separate switch operating in all live (active and neutral) conductors that is located in an accessible position.
or
(c)	An accessible isolating switch (lockable) operating in all live (active and neutral) conductors.
